local_intent: Ensure grape is perceived, move above it, perform precise approach and alignment with a retry, then verify end-effector is at the grape.
assumptions: Target label 'grape' refers to the same object as in the global plan
Safe clearance when moving above is 0.05 m
coherence_with_global: Matches the global sequence around alignment: re-acquire if needed, detect, move above, approach and align (with retry for misalignment), then verify position before grasp.
